review: one of the best games, i have ever played

Really really fun and immersive game, gotta love the punishments you get when you make dumb descisions like trying to win a fight with an overpowered group of bandits and being captured by them if you're not strong enough. Really recommend this to anyone who loved Dark Souls or Oblivion
